alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 26 at 10:54AM CDT until August 29 at 3:43AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Chickasawhay River At Enterprise affecting Clarke County. Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County. Leaf River At Hattiesburg affecting Forrest County. For the Pascagoula...including Collins, Near Hattiesburg, Hattiesburg, Laurel, Chunky, Arundel, Enterprise, Shubuta, Brooklyn...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chickasawhay River At Enterprise. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS.... * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 34.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 35.5 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 34.7 feet on 03/13/2016. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Chickasawhay River Enterprise 25.0 34.5 Fri 10 am CD 30.8 24.4 22.2 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
